name: both deeply alone
description: Monsterless experimental horror game. You are stuck in a sunk ship floating midwater and found a helping hand in getting a better signal during a power storm. You have to help her fix it by signalling if it is safe or not at the moment before she gives up. On the other hand, you have to manually control the drainage system to push back the flood from getting in your room. Incremental game with 4 endings. Mouse and keyboard controls. WARNING: mild flashing lights.
